item.description:
ü¶úüß†Adding conversational memory to your RAG app

The main UX for LLM applications is chat. That makes it important to know how to add conversational memory to your apps - including you RAG apps!

@curious_kaylynn walks through how to do exactly that!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l1JRl3Mvln0

item.description:
üë®‚ÄçüíªGitChat

The goal is for GitChat to be deployed internally at organizations as a helpful, secure, internally-facing AI with knowledge unique to each organization.

This OSS project by @kplley exposes a chat interface for a given GitHub repo

Here's why it's awesome:

üíØIs a‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1746571111922610415

item.title: The demo below is really interesting for a few reasons: ü¶úUses local LLMs (seems like @MistralAI via @ollama) üå≤RAG integration for PDFs and web p...
item.description:
The demo below is really interesting for a few reasons:

ü¶úUses local LLMs (seems like @MistralAI via @ollama)
üå≤RAG integration for PDFs and web pages

Even more exciting to us though... it changes up the UX! It's not just simply a chat text box

Super creative and practical


TonyMo:‚ÄÇüöÄ Just playing with chatbot for @Decentraland, powered by LLM! ü§ñ Fully localized with @OLLAMA , @LangChainAI , and @MistralAI, plus #RAG integration for PDF and web page.

Check out this video showcasing bot in action, inspired by @DecentralGames ' documentation. #AI + #web3

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇJacob Lee
üë™ TogetherAI Embeddings üë™

@togethercompute just launched hosted OSS embeddings! Swap it into your JS RAG pipelines in @LangChainAI ü¶úüîó JS/TS community 0.0.17.

The # of dimensions varies by model, so you may need to set up your vectorstore to match:

https://js.langchain.com/docs/integrations/text_embedding/togetherai

‚≠êÔ∏èAgents‚≠êÔ∏è

As part of v0.1.0, we:

üñºÔ∏èAdded documentation on the seven different agent types (and when to use each one)
üîóRewrote agents in LCEL for improved ability to customize

Agent Types: https://python.langchain.com/docs/modules/agents/agent_types/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=08qXj9w-CG4

item.title: üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ @togethercompute Embeddings ‚ÜóÔ∏è Today we‚Äôre excited to announce the new langchain-together Python package, which has connecti...
item.description:
üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ @togethercompute Embeddings ‚ÜóÔ∏è

Today we‚Äôre excited to announce the new langchain-together Python package, which has connections to Together‚Äôs LLM and Embeddings endpoints. This is the easiest way to access the next-gen embedding models their team has been developing. Learn‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745508818442969156


Together AI:‚ÄÇWe are thrilled to announce the Together Embeddings endpoint! üöÄ

Higher quality than OpenAI or Cohere in the MTEB benchmark. ‚úÖ
State of the art M2-Retrieval models with up to 32k context length. ‚úÖ
Up to 4x lower price. ‚úÖ

https://together.ai/blog/embeddings-endpoint-release

Detailsüëá

item.description:
LangChain v0.1.0 Highlight

‚≠êÔ∏èRetrieval‚≠êÔ∏è

One of the main use cases for LangChain is retrieval. Our v0.1.0 release highlights this with:

‚úÇÔ∏èLarge selection of text splitters
üß™Myriad of advanced retrieval techniques
üë™Support for multi-tenancy
üè°Indexing pipeline‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745485078283858057

item.title: ‚úÇÔ∏èSemantic Chunking In case you missed it, @GregKamradt is doing a great series on the "5 Levels of Text Splitting" One of the more interesting idea...
item.description:
‚úÇÔ∏èSemantic Chunking

In case you missed it, @GregKamradt is doing a great series on the "5 Levels of Text Splitting"

One of the more interesting ideas he introduces is "Semantic Chunking", where you use embedding distance to split text into chunks

Now in langchain-experimental!‚Ä¶ https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1745483297365578199
item.author: LangChain

item.title: RT Harrison Chase: I thought this was a really creative new way of splitting text So we added it to `langchain_experimental`ü¶úüß™ Check it out here...
item.description:
RT‚ÄÇHarrison Chase
I thought this was a really creative new way of splitting text

So we added it to `langchain_experimental`ü¶úüß™

Check it out here: https://python.langchain.com/docs/modules/data_connection/document_transformers/semantic-chunker

And watch @GregKamradt's excellent video below to better understand it!


Greg Kamradt:‚ÄÇ5 Levels Of Text Splitting: Semantic Splitting

Goal: Use embeddings to find chunks in our raw text

Experimental method using embedding distances between sequential sentences to tease out 'breakpoints'

If we find a good breakpoint, make a chunk

Check out the full video on YT
item.author: LangChain

item.description:
RT‚ÄÇDaniel San
Create React components with GPT-4-vision within VSCode üò±

Simply take a screenshot of any graphical interface and the chat will generate the corresponding React component for seamless integration into VSCode.

Download CodeGPT extension: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=DanielSanMedium.dscodegpt‚Ä¶
